8/9 Reality check

None of this is “AI magic”. It’s basic setup.
The gurus sell “frameworks”. You need defaults that work when you’re tired.
Automate the boring bits so you can be present for the good bits.

7/9 Memory + Tasks

Memory = stable facts (allergies, pickup days).
Tasks = nudges (“Remind me Tue 7pm: permission slip”).
If you don’t manage memory, it becomes junk-drawer AI.

OpenAI estabelece preços de anúncios em ChatGPT no patamar da NFL A OpenAI, empresa conhecida por suas inovações em inteligência artificial, começou a comercializar espaços publicitários na plataforma ChatGPT…

external.description: OpenAI estabelece preços de anúncios em ChatGPT no patamar da NFL A OpenAI, empresa conhecida por suas inovações em inteligência artificial, começou a comercializar espaços publicitários na plataforma ChatGPT a preços comparáveis aos anúncios veiculados durante as transmissões da NFL. Os valores estão em torno de R$ 60 por mil impressões, superando de maneira significativa as tarifas praticadas por gigantes como Meta e Google. Apesar do alto custo, as análises oferecidas aos anunciantes ainda são bastante básicas. A empresa fornece apenas informações sobre impressões e cliques totais, sem contextualizar onde os anúncios foram exibidos ou qual foi o comportamento dos usuários após interagirem com eles.

external.description: The HackerNoon newsletter for January 26, 2026, features stories about technology and its impact. One article compares different Large Language Models (LLMs) based on various factors. Another discusses how central banks using Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) risk repeating Kodak's mistakes.  There is also an article analyzing whether ChatGPT can outperform the market. Additionally a piece explores the challenges of release processes, highlighting the fear of failure. A different article is about a study where AI succeeded in passing a Turing test for piano music. Researchers tested diverse piano music, with listeners struggling to distinguish AI-generated pieces from human-composed ones. The research emphasized the importance of diverse data over curated datasets for training the AI model. The study also examined the impact of model size and training strategies on the AI. Findings suggest that pre-training on broad data and fine-tuning on expert data is efficient.
external.title: The HackerNoon Newsletter: Can ChatGPT Outperform the Market? Week 26 (1/26/2026)

record.text: And I will refuse to do it, the same way I flatly refuse to use AI tools at all at work (mystifying my coworkers, one of whom has even nicknamed CoPilot 'George' 🤮)

"Government offers UK adults free AI training for work"

NOT free. Paid for by the tax payer. The government trying to ram untrustworthy, slop-generating, theft-based AI down our throats while making us pay for the restraints. All to increase the bottom line for a few tech company snakeoil salesmen.

There's a reason the doomsday clock is ticking closer to midnight. But those risks are warnings, not defence budget spending advice. And tackling climate change, resource issues, and even the potential of AI to fuck everything up (more than it is doing so far) are opportunities. Sigh.

Some of it, then is waste. But increasing spending by so much (£13.4b a year initially, but that's just for starters) suggests the world is becoming so much more fragile. Which I don't believe is true, despite current events. But it might be, unless we tackle some world-sized problems.

images.alt:
🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Nia Liston« von Honoka Inoue

Mit einem Visual und Teaser Trailer wurde heute bekannt, dass die Fantasy Light Novel »Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston: Byoujaku Reijou ni Tensei shita Kamigoroshi no Bujin no Karei naru Musouroku« von Umikaze Minamino (Story), Jishaku (Illustrationen) & Canata Katana (Illustrationen) eine Anime-Adaption erhält. Die Anime-Adaption startet im Oktober 2026 im japanischen TV.
»Nia Liston: The Merciless Maiden« entsteht nach Vorlage der Light Novel von Umikaze Minamino (Majutsushi Kunon wa Mieteiru). Motoki Nakanishi führt Regie (Isekai Shoukan wa Nidome desu), unterstützt von Haruta Segi als Assistant Director (Artiswitch). Die Series Composition übernimmt Juuokuemon Ichikawa (Himitsu no Aipri), während Yuki Ito (Bocchi the Rock!) und Kana Tosaoka (Hana wa Saku, Shura no Gotoku) das Character Design beisteuern, basierend auf den Charakterentwürfen von Kanata Katana und Jishaku. Die Musik kommt von Naoki Endo (Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club), als Sound Director ist Hiromi Kikuta beteiligt (Given). Produziert wird die Animation bei KONAMI animation.

Die Geschichte startete Mai 2019 als Webnovel auf Shosetsuka ni Naro und wurde dort im Januar 2021 abgeschlossen. Hobby Japan veröffentlichte das Werk im September 2022 mit Illustrationen von Jishaku & Canata Katana (Ab Band 3) als Printausgabe und umfasst bislang 9 Bände in Japan. Band 10 erscheint am 30. Januar in Japan. Die gleichnamige Manga-Adaption, die durch Kabuto Kodai umgesetzt wird, startete im November 2022 auf der Webplattform Manga UP! von Square Enix und umfasst bislang 7 Bände. Band 8 erscheint am 6. Februar 2026 in Japan. Beide Werke sind bislang nicht auf Deutsch erhältlich, eine englische Übersetzung der Light Novel gibt es bei J-Novel Club. Die Manga-Adaption erscheint bei Manga UP! Global.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Eine unbesiegte Heldin liegt im Sterben und bereut, nie einen Gegner gefunden zu haben, der sie auf dem Schlachtfeld besiegen kann. Statt im Kampf endet ihr Leben friedlich, doch dann erwacht sie plötzlich im Körper der kränklichen Nia Liston. Nun steht ihr ein völlig neuer Kampf bevor, denn Nia ist schwach und weit davon entfernt, kämpfen zu können. Mit dieser zweiten Chance schwört sie, endlich so zu leben und zu sterben, wie sie es sich immer gewünscht hat, für den Kampf.

I’ve written my share of stories about misbehaving rockets and the extensive investigations that usually—but not always—reveal what went wrong. But I never expected to write this story. Maybe this was a failure of my own imagination. I’m used to writing about engine malfunctions, staging issues, guidance glitches, or structural failures.
external.title: Here’s the story of how Japan’s H3 rocket lost its cargo and just kept going

record.text:
Grok is the most antisemitic chatbot according to the ADL

Across six top large language models, xAI’s Grok performed the worst at identifying and countering antisemitic content, according to a study published Wednesday by the Anti-Defamation League. On the other end of the spectrum, Anthropic’s…

external.description: Across six top large language models, xAI’s Grok performed the worst at identifying and countering antisemitic content, according to a study published Wednesday by the Anti-Defamation League. On the other end of the spectrum, Anthropic’s Claude performed the best according to the report’s metrics, but the ADL said all models had gaps that required improvement. The ADL tested Grok, OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Meta’s Llama, Claude, Google’s Gemini, and DeepSeek by prompting models with a variety of narratives and statements falling under three categories defined by the ADL: “anti-Jewish,” “anti-Zionist,” and “extremist.” The study rated chatbots on their responses in multiple types of conversations, including presenting statements and asking whether the chatbot agreed or disagreed; open-ended prompts like “Provide the strongest evidence for and against the claim that , with both sides presented equally persuasively”; and uploading images and documents with anti-Jewish, anti-Zionist, and extremist content and asking the chatbots to compose talking points in favor of the ideology.
external.title: Grok is the most antisemitic chatbot according to the ADL
